title: Generic Cuts: An Efficient Algorithm for Optimal Inference in Higher Order MRF-MAP

author: Chetan Arora, Indian Institute of Technology Delhi
chairman: Ramin Zabih, Department of Computer Science, Cornell University
Laurent Itti, University of Southern California
